Core Design and Aesthetics principles of a website

2262800 Sachin Govender

Creating a website is an incredibly exciting thing however the success of a website can entirely depend on its web design. As in many cases the website is the face of your brand or business and is how potential customers and viewers are introduced to it. A simple website that is well structured and provides great usability is more likely to garner higher views than that of a website with poor user experience. To further understand how one can improve their website lets first understand what is meant by aesthetics.

Refrences

Carrier, D. C. (2020, May 16). The Work of Art in the Age of the Internet. HYPERALLERGIC. Retrieved March 13, 2022, from https://hyperallergic.com/563938/the-work-of-art-in-the-age-of-the-internet/

Stern, A. S., & Mateas, M. M. (2005). Facade. Electronic Literature Collection. Retrieved March 13, 2022, from https://collection.eliterature.org/2/works/mateas_facade.html

Thompson, T. T. (2020, April 23). The Story of Facade: The AI-Powered Interactive Drama. Game Developer. Retrieved March 13, 2022, from https://www.gamedeveloper.com/design/the-story-of-facade-the-ai-powered-interactive-drama
